Description.Name: AC/10 Zeus AAA Ammo
Description.Details: Designed for anti-Air operations, has extra accuracy vs flying targets.  Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E. Has 10 shots.
